title: 396-B
statement: B. On Sum of Fractionstime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutLet's assume thatv(n)is the largest prime number, that does not exceedn;u(n)is the smallest prime number strictly greater thann.Find.InputThe first line contains integert(1 ≤t≤ 500)— the number of testscases.Each of the followingtlines of the input contains integern(2 ≤n≤ 109).OutputPrinttlines: thei-th of them must contain the answer to thei-th test as an irreducible fraction "p/q", wherep,qare integers,q> 0.ExamplesInput223Output1/67/30
